name: Tech Demo (WIP)
description:
This is an early technical demonstration for my upcoming game and its engine.

The engine is written from scratch with C++ with the help of SDL2

for platform specific functionality and GLEW for modern OpenGL functionality.

This demo includes demonstrations for:

-GJK based collision handling

-Physically based rendering

-Skeletal animations

-Lights and shadowmaps

-Environment mapping

-Proprietary file formats
